thread.section_title: Words Anywhere Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Words Anywhere | www.wordsanywhere.com | 2 of 139
thread.title: Inv

author: Inv
title: Inv
text: This purchase worked out very well for me and without turning my home into a graffiti site I’m sure I would use them again. Ordering was extremely easy and clear cut to use. The price (by comparison) was excellent, and I could use Paypal. The order was acknowledged almost immediately with a tracking number and showed up in 3 days?? It was just what I ordered and expected, and had excellent installation directions. I would have like more color range. I was really looking for a kind of burnt orange/nicotine color. Nutmeg was closest. One caveat. I would like to know who the owners are as I don’t patronize products/ companies that conflict with my sense of world justice. I ordered before finding this out.
